div.span: The Bergenfield Public School District will continue distance learning from home through May 15, 2020.

During this time of distance learning,
all school related activities are cancelled.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.p: The Bergenfield Public School District is currently closed. New student registrations are still being accepted electronically. For questions regarding registration, please email the District Registrar at anieves@bergenfield.org or leave a message at 201-385-8600 ext. 1609. Click the title for additional directions and downloadable forms.

a.title: Go to comments for New Student Registration

div.p: A family who does not already receive Free and Reduced Lunch services may complete the Lunch Application which can be found on the left side of the district website or by clicking the title above. Completed applications should be emailed to dedwards@bergenfield.org or mailed to Attention: Diane Edwards, Bergenfield Board of Education, 225 W. Clinton Ave., Bergenfield, NJ 07621.

a.title: Go to comments for Free and Reduced Lunch

img.alt: (POSTPONED) BHS Athletic Department - Hall of Fame Inductees - Class of 2020

a.span: (POSTPONED) BHS Athletic Department - Hall of Fame Inductees - Class of 2020

div.p: (Postponed to Wednesday, June 24, 2020) - The BHS Athletic Hall of Fame committee has decided to postpone the dinner to Wednesday, June 24, 2020, beginning at 6:30 pm, at Seasons in Washington Township, NJ.. Click the title to read more.

a.title: Go to comments for (POSTPONED) BHS Athletic Department - Hall of Fame Inductees - Class of 2020

img.alt: BHS Takes First at 2019-20 County Debate League Tourney

a.span: BHS Takes First at 2019-20 County Debate League Tourney

div.p: Bergenfield High School finished in First Place at the 2019-2020 Bergen County Debate League Tournament at Dwight-Englewood School on February 4th. The tournament included teams from Cresskill, Ridgefield Park, Wood-Ridge, Dwight-Englewood, and Becton Regional in East Rutherford.

a.title: Go to comments for BHS Takes First at 2019-20 County Debate League Tourney
